action.action-desc: Mr. Brown of Maryland (for himself, Mr. Allred, Ms. Bass, Ms. Bonamici, Ms. Brown of Ohio, Mr. Carson, Mr. Casten, Mrs. Cherfilus-McCormick, Mrs. Hayes, Mr. Langevin, Ms. Norton, Mr. Panetta, Ms. Porter, Mr. Raskin, Mr. Soto, Mr. Suozzi, Mr. Thompson of Mississippi, Mr. Vargas, and Ms. Wilson of Florida) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Educators Expense Deduction Modernization Act of 2022.

section.header: Increase in deduction for certain expenses of eligible educators

subsection.text: Section 62(a)(2)(D) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: in the heading, by striking elementary and secondary school teachers and inserting eligible educators, and

subsection.text: Section 62(d)(3) of such Code is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking calendar year 2014 and inserting calendar year 2021.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2021.
